name: GettysburgCollegeDining
0:
”Alexa, ask gettysburg college dining, get menu for dive on wednesday”
”Alexa, ask gettysburg college dining, what is the breakfast menu for dining center on tuesday”
”Alexa, ask gettysburg college dining, what is the bullet special on friday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gettysburg college dining
des:
The skill’s purpose is to present the current menu options from Gettysburg College Dining Services at various campus locations. A user asks Gettysburg College Dining for the menu of a specific venue on campus. The user can get a list of the venues supported and also use Help to get a sample list of phrases to use with the skill. If a venue has different offerings during the day, the user can ask for breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner. A user can also use such general terms as Today, Tomorrow, or Tonight. Here is a list of sample utterances:

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, get lunch menu for dining center on Monday

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, to get menu for commons on Thursday

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, get menu for dive on Wednesday

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, what is the breakfast menu for dining center on Tuesday

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, what is the bullet special on Friday

Alexa, ask Gettysburg College Dining, what is the special at bullet on Thursday
